articles.author: Lalee Ibssa, Gabriella Abdul-Hakim, Soo Rin Kim
articles.title: Trump claims Black Americans relate to his criminal prosecutions - ABC News
articles.description: "What’s happening to me, happens to them,” said Trump
articles.content: Former President Donald Trump said he was speaking to President Joe Bidens worst nightmare while courting Black conservatives at the Black Conservative Federation Gala in Columbia, South Carolina: Hu… [+3576 chars]
